app.title: Supplementary Materials
app.p: The following are available online at https://www.mdpi.com/2223-7747/9/12/1665/s1, Figure S1: Top-hit species distribution of top 64 longest scaffolds (all >62 kb) from in vivo M. cordata, Figure S2: scaffold assembly evaluation, Table S1: top 100 species distribution of contigs in each stray region from NT blast results.
